validationErrors.title: Ana bukatar batu
validationErrors.endDateLarge: Ba zai yiwu a saita kwanar watan gamawa ba kafin na farawa

buzzListing.title: KALLI ABINDA YAKE TAFIYA A DUNIYAR ZANE
buzzListing.placeholderSearchTitle: Nemo hotunan nunawa ta batun su...

mainSection.heading: Yadda za'a rubuta bayani
mainSection.firstPara: Ka dauki kanka a matsayin mai rubutun ra'ayin ka. Ka rubuta wani abu mai kayatarwa game da zane da masoya zane. Ba kawai dama ce da zaka tallata kanka da zanen ka kawai ba, wajen rubutun ka wajene da zakayi rubutu akan batu da zai kayatar da jama'a baki daya.
mainSection.secondPara: Kanada bukatar cike shafin ka akan ARTMO kafin ka wallafa rubutu.
mainSection.thirdPara: Bawan wallafawa, za'a gane ka a matsayin mai wallafawa.

buzzSubSection.heading: Buzz:
buzzSubSection.firstPara: Rubutu bayani akan batu da zai kayata masu amfani da ARTMO. Kalli misalai masu kyau a Buzz

potdSubSection.heading: Kayataccen Hoton Yau | POTD:
potdSubSection.firstPara: Shiga cikin category idan kana da shahararren hoto da kakeson yin rubutu akai. Yi amfani da wannan hoton a matsayin hoton feature don fadawa duniya labarin wannan hoton. Za'a wallafa POTD dinka

exhibitionSubSection.heading: Nuna Hotuna:
exhibitionSubSection.firstPara: Yi amfani da wannan category idan kana da rumbun hotuna ko shirya nuna hotuna. Yi rubutu akan nuna hotunan da kake shiryawa sai aga bayanan ka a gefen Nuna Hotuna.
exhibitionSubSection.secondPara: Za'a wallafa rubutun Nuna Hotunan ka
